item.title: Report X-2024010434
item.description:
Report X-2024010434

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-23T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-10
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO PICK UP LEAKER ON THE IRREG BELT. SMALL AMOUNT OF FLUID WAS ON THE BELT. USING THE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET TO DON ON PROPER PPE FOR THE SPILL, RESPONDER PUT THE BUCKET ON A SPILL TRAY AND LID HAD A CRACK ON TOP. RESPONDER CONTINUED TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL WITH ABSORBENT PADS AND MOVED PACKAGE TO THE PSC AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESS.
